video.title: Julius Jr.
video.synopsis: Paul Frank's fun artwork comes to life in this show that follows monkey Julius Jr. and his friends as they explore the world and help each other out.

episodes.synopsis: A millipede who longs to fly shows the gang how to like themselves just the way they are; Julius builds a robot to replace Worry Bear's lost toy.
episodes.title: Butterfly Dreams / Rock Sock 3000

episodes.synopsis: A magic cupcake helps Clancy feel better about being short, but it works too well; Worry Bear gets scared when Clancy's hobbyhorse comes to life.
episodes.title: Pony Macaroni / Stretch Clancy

episodes.synopsis: Sheree thinks she can run Sagebrush Farm alone until she tries it; the gang learns that Ping's invisible dragon friend is real and needs their help.
episodes.title: Farmer Sheree / Dez the Dragon

episodes.synopsis: Julius is afraid to tell Sheree that he doesn't like her banana desserts; Julius and his friends disagree about what game to play.
episodes.title: Pirates and Superheroes / Banana-licious

episodes.synopsis: Clancy gets sick and the gang goes to extremes to help him fall asleep; Julius is upset when his shadow turns out to be a better inventor than he is.
episodes.title: Clancy's Sniffles / Shadow Play

episodes.synopsis: Ping decides to color the whole box pink, without talking to the gang first; Worry Bear and Ping cooperate on figuring out their Halloween costumes.
episodes.title: Dressed for Spook-cess / Think Pink

episodes.synopsis: Worry Bear pays so much attention to his sticker collection that he ignores his friends; Clancy gets upset when he can't learn a new sport right away.
episodes.title: Worry Bear's Collection / Rocket Roller Skates

episodes.synopsis: The gang tries to teach Worry Bear the fun of trying new things; Sheree and Julius accidentally hurt a cloud's feelings while teaching it to snow.
episodes.title: No Snow Mo / Gravity Games

episodes.synopsis: Sheree's friends "borrow" all her Bouncy Beans without asking permission; Julius gets so caught up in being a hero that he forgets to keep a promise.
episodes.title: Bouncy Beans / A Real Hero

episodes.synopsis: Clancy and Bob the dog get carried away pulling pranks on the gang; a shooting star enchants the gang when she crashes into the box.
episodes.title: Star Games / The Joke's on Who

episodes.synopsis: Sheree frets over her birthday gift for Worry Bear; Ping sets out to prove to the friends that she can do things for herself.
episodes.title: From Me to You / Give Ping a Chance

episodes.synopsis: Dez disappears when it's time to perform a dance with Ping; Worry Bear grows extremely upset when his party doesn't go exactly as he'd planned.
episodes.title: Magic Monkey, Hidden Dragon / The Perfect Pirate Day

episodes.synopsis: Clancy learns the importance of putting things away where they belong; Clancy is afraid to tell Julius that he accidentally broke the Rock Sock 3000.
episodes.title: Tidy up Time / Roboflop

episodes.synopsis: Clancy wants revenge when Sharky the pirate accidentally wrecks the gang's sand castle; a dinosaur dentist helps reassure a scared Worry Bear.
episodes.title: Operation Sand Squasher / Dr. Flossoraptor

episodes.synopsis: The gang's lunch disappears during a picnic in Bugswana; Julius tries to push his ideas over everyone else's in a snowflake-making contest.
episodes.title: The Sneaky Snackers / Make a Flake

episodes.synopsis: Julius is so focused on fixing his invention, the Fruitronic 5000, that he forgets to eat; Ping begins to doubt her kite-flying abilities.
episodes.title: The Fruitronic 5000 / Flight of Fancy

episodes.synopsis: Clancy and his friends help Pirate Diamondbeard find buried treasure; Worry Bear nearly misses a dance because he's too busy helping others.
episodes.title: Clancy, Be Careful / Just Speak Up

episodes.synopsis: Sheree tries to find out why there are no pictures of Ping in the gang's photo album; Nova doesn't invite Clancy to her outer-space birthday party.
episodes.title: Say, Ping! / Happy Birthday, Nova

episodes.synopsis: The gang's routine is thrown off when Shaka Brah moves into the box; Julius finds Squeakers the duck, one of his old baby toys.
episodes.title: Shaka Brah in the House / Baby Squeakers

episodes.synopsis: Julius helps Worry Bear find his missing Giggle Goggles; Julius may lose the scavenger hunt when slow Vic the snail joins his team.
episodes.title: Giggle Goggles / Scavenger Safari

episodes.synopsis: Clancy turns everything the gang does into a contest, taking the fun out of it all; Julius ignores safety during the launch of his hot-air balloon.
episodes.title: The Very Berry Race / Check the Checklist

episodes.synopsis: Sheree and the friends find fun activities to do in the rain; Clancy gets careless when Worry Bear asks him to keep an eye on his rock collection.
episodes.title: Crow-Con / Rock Sitting

episodes.synopsis: Julius learns that faster doesn't mean better when he repairs Scooter the stunt plane; the gang makes a big mistake when planning a parade.
episodes.title: Plane Dilemma / Delayed Parade

episodes.synopsis: When the gang goes camping on Mars, a spooky story makes Clancy nervous; Worry Bear grows annoyed with Ping, who's trying to be just like him.
episodes.title: Bump on Mars / Worry Bear Junior

episodes.synopsis: Julius's music group breaks up, but he finds that his one-man band isn't as much fun; Clancy is frustrated when he can't beat a game's high score.
episodes.title: Julius Goes Solo / Clancy Can't Win

episodes.synopsis: Julius and Clancy try to find a new home for Chachi, who can't live in the cold of Icelaska; Chachi gets tired when everyone plays with him at once.
episodes.title: Welcome Home Chachi / Chachi Time
